articles.author: Firdose Moonda
articles.title: Heinrich Klaasen retires from Test cricket - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He will continue to be available for South Africa in white-ball formats
articles.content:
NewsHe will continue to be available for South Africa in white-ball formats
Heinrich Klaasen played four Tests between 2019 and 2023  •  AFP/Getty Images
